legacy.full_text: AI labs: please offer an option to gift a one-year subscription to your premium tier - preferably anonymously. Eventually, some nations will subsidize plans for their citizens. Until then, we need as many paths as possible to get this into the hands of those who will use it best.

legacy.description: üè∞ - I write about AI, mostly. Expect some strange sights.
legacy.name: Andrew Curran

legacy.full_text: I think ME nations will be the first to offer subsidized subscriptions, KSA even hinted at it during the Trump visit. In the West, it‚Äôs politically sensitive and would provoke backlash from artists. Probably ends up being Canada or the Nords first.

legacy.description: üè∞ - I write about AI, mostly. Expect some strange sights.

legacy.full_text: From what I've seen, the overlap between those who work exceptionally well with the models and those who can‚Äôt afford $200/m is huge right now, because many of those people, by their nature, work best alone.

legacy.description: üè∞ - I write about AI, mostly. Expect some strange sights.

legacy.full_text: One way to leverage steadily increasing model intelligence; Pro users could choose to donate a portion of our usage into a shared pool - then let the models decide who receives Pro access. The Mandate of the Machine.
